--- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, "nfoscarini" <nfoscarini@...>
wrot=
e:
>
> Hi,
> 
> I'm working with Heritrix 1.12.1
> 
> I am writing my own E=
xtractorHTML, and when I extract a URL from an
> <img> HTML tag I want to r=
emember the width/height parameters (if
> their are any).
> 
> When I creat=
e the UURI with the factory is there a way to tag extra
> data to the insta=
nce. So that later my custom decide rules can check
> for this extra data?
=
> 
> I don't see anyway of doing this with a UURI instance, but I was
> won=
dering if it can be stored in a CrawlURI instance.
> 
> Is there any harm i=
n called the CandidateURI.putString( key, value )
> methods with your own c=
ustomer properties?
> 
> My problem, is at this point. I'm a little confuse=
d. If I call the
> CrawlURL.createLink I get make a "Link". How do I get th=
e CrawlURI for
> the new Link to add to it's properties.
> 
> If I'm headed=
 down the completely wrong track. Please let me know.
>
